parameters.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryIds
parameters.description: The IDs of the resource discovery instances. You can query up to 100 instances at a time.

parameters.name: IpamResourceDiscoveryName
parameters.description:
The name of the resource discovery.

The name must be 1 to 128 characters in length and cannot start with http\:// or https\://.

parameters.name: IsShared
parameters.description: Specifies whether the resource discovery is shared.

parameters.name: MaxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: 1 to 100. Default value: 10.

parameters.name: NextToken
parameters.description:
The token for the next page of results. Valid values:

- If **NextToken** is empty, no more results are available.

- If a value is returned for **NextToken**, the value is the token that is used for the next query.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~36063~~) operation to get the region ID.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group to which the resource discovery belongs.

parameters.name: Type
parameters.description:
The type of the resource discovery.

> The following types are supported:
>
> - system: a default resource discovery created by the system.
>
> - custom: a custom resource discovery created by a user.
